announcements.details: There will be TWO masses on Sunday, 4th May, 2025. Offertory will be led by Sacred Heart Confratenity and the Thursday borns. Bidding Prayers will be led by the Lectors.

announcements.details: The 3-day deanery crusade comes off from Friday, April 25 to Sunday, April 27 here in St. Bakhita. On Friday, the crusade will start at 6pm. Come and surrender your praises and prayers with hope and you shall not be disappointed.
announcements.title: 3-Day Deanery Crusade

events.details: Date: 25th-27th April, 2025 | Venue: St Bakhita Catholic Church
